query:
INSERT INTO onboarding_templates (task_name, task_category, description, days_from_start) VALUES 
('Submit NID/Passport Copy', 'documents', 'Provide a copy of National ID card or Passport for verification', 0),
('Submit Educational Certificates', 'documents', 'Provide copies of all educational certificates and transcripts', 0),
('Submit Bank Account Details', 'documents', 'Provide bank account information for salary disbursement', 0),
('Submit Passport Size Photos', 'documents', 'Provide 2 passport size photographs for employee records', 0),
('Sign Employment Contract', 'documents', 'Review and sign the employment contract', 0),
('Setup Workstation', 'equipment', 'Assign and setup computer, desk, and office supplies', 1),
('Issue ID Card', 'equipment', 'Create and issue employee ID card', 3),
('Setup Email Account', 'access', 'Create company email account and configure on devices', 1),
('Setup System Access', 'access', 'Grant access to required software and systems', 1),
('Office Tour', 'introduction', 'Complete office tour and facility orientation', 1),
('Team Introduction', 'introduction', 'Introduce to team members and key stakeholders', 1),
('Meet with HR', 'introduction', 'Complete HR orientation session covering policies and benefits', 1),
('Company Policies Training', 'training', 'Complete training on company policies and procedures', 7),
('Safety Training', 'training', 'Complete workplace safety and emergency procedures training', 7),
('Role-Specific Training', 'training', 'Complete job-specific training and shadowing', 14),
('30-Day Review Meeting', 'other', 'Schedule and complete 30-day performance check-in', 30);
